doctor.name: Dr. A.S.M Sadequl Islam
doctor.specialty: Liver, Gastro, Pancreatic Medicine Specialist & Diabetologist
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. A.S.M Sadequl Islam is a Liver, Gastro, Pancreatic Medicine Specialist & Diabetologist in Bogura. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Hepatology), CCD, CMED. He is a Assistant Professor & Head, Hepatology at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. A.S.M Sadequl Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 4pm to 9pm (Sat to Wednesday), 9am to 6pm (Friday).

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura
